title: Bought a skin right before sale
body: Hey i bought heartseeker ashe and didnt see she would be on sale next day, is there a way i could get some of my rp back? I literally bought her yesterday now shes on sale XD

replies.body:
I'm glad to see *ZombieMaster* was able to investigate and find that you had not missed a sale. Going forward, to ensure that you'll never miss a sale, keep an eye on the [Sales News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales), which is where we always post weekly and monthly sales schedules and content. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Where do you see that Heartseeker Ashe is on sale? I don't see anywhere in the News portion of this website that states it's on sale, nor is it on sale in the actual store? There is Sweetheart Sona on sale, which I guess has a similar looking splash art, but no Heartseeker Ashe.
Yeah nvm my friend kept telling me it was ashe on sale. >.<
